ABOUT.TITLE: About Us
ABOUT.DESCRIPTION: CuidaDos is a platform aiming to be a safe and efficient intermediary for hiring care services for the elderly or those needing daily assistance. We are a digital care platform created with the aim of improving the quality of life of people who need support in their daily lives. Our team is made up of professionals from the technological and social fields who share a common vision: to make access to care services simple, secure and transparent. We believe that caring for people should be based on trust, professionalism and closeness, which is why we work to connect users with specialized care service providers. The platform was created in response to a real and growing social need. Population aging, the increase in dependent people and the lack of time for many families have led to a high demand for care services. However, finding reliable companies, comparing options or managing issues is not always easy. We identified the absence of a single space where users could safely and easily hire care services with support throughout the entire process. Our commitment is to create an inclusive, intuitive and reliable digital environment that contributes to dignifying the care sector and improving the lives of those who need it most.

SCOPE.TITLE: Social and Commercial Scope
SCOPE.DESC: The project has a dual focus:
SCOPE.SOCIAL_DESC: Facilitates the search and request for home help.
SCOPE.COMMERCIAL_DESC: Involves hiring professional services, generating economic opportunities for companies and caregivers in the sector.

VALUE.TITLE: Added Value
VALUE.DESC: The platform stands out by allowing users to choose the company that best suits their needs with "a single click", based on user reviews and offering conflict resolution services.

ASSISTANCE.TITLE: User Assistance
ASSISTANCE.DESC: Assistance is offered through guided videos, chat, and calls for people who need help managing the application.

MEMBER1.DESC: Strategist with over 10 years of experience in the socio-sanitary field and team management.

MEMBER2.DESC: Responsible for technological development and ensuring a secure and accessible platform.

MEMBER3.DESC: Specialist in coordinating the caregiver network and ensuring services quality.

MEMBER4.DESC: Dedicated to offering human support and resolving doubts for an excellent experience.

BAJA.DESC_2: By continuing, your account will be deactivated and you will not be able to access this profile again.

CONTRACT.TITLE: Contract Cancellation Confirmation
CONTRACT.DESC_1: Attention! You are about to cancel a service contract. Upon confirmation, the contract will be voided in CuidaDos. What happens now?

LIST.RECORD: Change Record: The cancellation will be registered immediately and your calendar updated.
LIST.COMM: Communication: You will receive a confirmation notification via email or in-app.

CONTRACT.NOTE: If you have questions or a conflict arises, remember that CuidaDos acts as an intermediary.
CONTRACT.CONFIRM: Do you want to proceed with the cancellation?

SERVICE.TITLE: Warning: Deletion of Offered Service
SERVICE.DESC_1: You are about to remove a service from your catalog. If confirmed, the service will be permanently deleted.
SERVICE.SUBTITLE: Consequences of Deletion:

LIST.CESSATION: Offer Cessation: Users will no longer be able to search for or hire this service.
LIST.VISIBILITY: Loss of Visibility: The service and its details will be removed from search results.

SERVICE.IMPORTANT_DESC: If this service has already been hired, we strongly recommend managing those active contracts to avoid issues.

GENERIC.TITLE: Deletion Confirmation
GENERIC.SUBTITLE: Deleting data entails:

LIST.PROFILE: The client or company profile and associated data will be deleted.
LIST.CONTRACTS: All active or future service contracts are immediately voided.

GENERIC.NOTE: The platform will notify the other party regarding the forced service cancellation.

TERMS_PAGE.TITLE: Terms and Conditions and Privacy Policy

SUB_1.TITLE: 1.1. Introduction
SUB_1.TEXT: Welcome to {{appName}}. This application acts as a technological intermediary platform that facilitates contact and service management between users demanding care or services ('Clients') and professionals or entities offering them ('Companies').

SUB_2.TITLE: 1.2. Registration and Security
SUB_2.TEXT: To use the service, the user must register providing truthful data. The password is personal and non-transferable. The user is responsible for all actions taken from their account. We reserve the right to suspend accounts that provide false information or misuse the platform.

SUB_3.TITLE: 1.3. How Contracts Work
SUB_3.TEXT: By clicking the 'Hire' button, a digital link is generated between the Client and the Company. {{appName}} is not a party to this final service contract, acting exclusively as a management and communication tool. Responsibility for the quality, schedule, and execution of the service rests exclusively with the providing Company.

SUB_4.TITLE: 1.4. Conduct Rules and Messaging
SUB_4.TEXT: The internal messaging system must be used exclusively for the coordination of contracted services. Sending spam, offensive, discriminatory, or illegal content is prohibited. Failure to comply with this rule will result in immediate expulsion from the platform.

SECTION_2.TITLE: 2. Privacy Policy and Legal Framework
SECTION_2.INTRO_BOX: This Privacy Policy is governed by current regulations in Spain and Europe, specifically: the GDPR (Regulation EU 2016/679), the LOPD-GDD (Organic Law 3/2018), and the LSSI-CE (Law 34/2002).

SUB_1.TITLE: 2.1. Data Controller
SUB_1.TEXT: The data will be processed by the application owner, based in Spain. For any management related to privacy and data protection, you can contact: {{email}}.

SUB_2.TITLE: 2.2. Data We Collect and Necessity
SUB_2.LIST_1: Identification Data (ID, Name, Date of Birth): Strictly necessary to verify legal age and legal capacity to formalize contracts.
SUB_2.LIST_2: Contact and Location Data: Necessary for the physical execution of the service at the client's location.
SUB_2.LIST_3: Activity Data: Security logs and contracts to comply with LSSI and service traceability.

SUB_3.TITLE: 2.3. Purpose and Legitimacy
SUB_3.TEXT: The legal basis for processing is the execution of the contract (Art. 6.1.b GDPR) and compliance with legal obligations. Your data will not be used for purposes other than platform management without your explicit consent.

SUB_4.TITLE: 2.4. Data Transfer
SUB_4.TEXT: Your data will not be transferred to third parties unless there is a legal obligation or contractual necessity:
SUB_4.LIST_1: To the service counterparty (Company/Client) exclusively for the provision of the contracted service.
SUB_4.LIST_2: To technology providers (Data Processors) such as Supabase, which guarantee security according to European standards.

SUB_5.TITLE: 2.5. User Rights
SUB_5.TEXT: In accordance with regulations, you may exercise your rights of Access, Rectification, Deletion, Opposition, Limitation, and Portability by sending an email to the indicated address.
